resources.string: Regular Citizens have no special powers, their strength lies in their numbers.
Mafia – plays against Citizens. Has information about other Mafia members, participates in all discussions
Each night The Detective is given an opportunity to investigate another player whether or not that player is a Mafioso.
Belongs to Citizen’s team. Deathless during night.
A Doctor is a role that targets a player at night to protect that player from a single kill made during that night.
Don Mafia is the main mafioso. Don can investigate another player whether or not that player is a Detective.
Does not belong to any team. Kills any player at night. Maniac wins when he remains the last player alive.
Prostitute plays for a team of civilians. Every night, she chooses one player with whom she will spend the night.
